statements: DELETE FROM yield_data WHERE location='Field A';
DELETE FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'California' AND crop_type = 'Apples';
DELETE FROM yield_data WHERE date = '2023-10-15' AND yield < 50;
DELETE FROM yield_data WHERE date = '2021-09-15' AND location = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM productivity_analysis WHERE trend_analysis LIKE '%positive%' AND productivity_change > 0.5;
DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_type = 'Harvest' AND date < '2022-01-01';
